Accelerator Field.card_desc: [Barricade] You and your allies gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 5s when passing through Barricade.

Architectonics.card_desc: [Turret] Turrets now deal 20% more damage, and have a 3s faster Cooldown.

Bowling Ball.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Gain a Shield with {scale=300|300} Health during Rocket Boots and for 3s after.

Bunker.card_desc: [Barricade] Increase the Health of your Barricade by {scale=250|250}.

Combat Repair.card_desc: [Turret] Standing near your Turret heals it for {scale=100|100} Health every second.

Double Time.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Increase the speed of Rocket Boots by {scale=10|10}%

Failsafe.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping below {scale=10|10}% of your max Health resets the cooldown of Rocket Boots.

Field Deploy.card_desc: [Turret] Reduce the Deploy Time of your Turret by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Forged Alloy.card_desc: [Turret] Increase the Health of your Turret by {scale=175|175}.

Fortify.card_desc: [Barricade] Barricade gains 3000 Health and its Cooldown is reduced by 3s.

Foundation.card_desc: [Barricade] Increase the Duration of Barricade by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Fuel Efficiency.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Increase the duration of Rocket Boots by {scale=0.15|0.15}s.

Healing Station.card_desc: [Turret] Standing near your Turret heals you for {scale=45|45} Health per second.

One Man's Scrap.card_desc: [Armor] When your Turret is destroyed heal for {scale=100|100} over 5s.

Palisade.card_desc: [Barricade] Reduce the Cooldown of Barricade by {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Red Streak.card_desc: [Rocket Boots] Reduce the cooldown of Rocket Boots by {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Tinkerin.card_desc: [Weapon] Modify your Blunderbuss to fire a single slug that deals 560 damage.
